nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_799_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She has certainly gained in confidence over the last couple of years.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_800_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The actor made the headlines for having an affair.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_801_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Greg's parents are worried about his exposure to the kind of people they don't approve of while he's at college.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_802_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The opposition parties are calling for the minister's resignation over the scandal.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_803_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The administration is in the process of drawing up a peace plan.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_804_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She'll end up penniless if she keeps spending as much as that.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_805_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She lays bare her three unhappy marriages in her autobiography.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_806_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Hoping that he might be able to shed some light on the problem, I asked Paul to look at the engine.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_807_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The outside influences have no bearing on what you can do for your basketball team.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_808_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Thank you; I'll store that piece of news away for a time when I might need it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_809_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: "Make no mistake about it," he said, "this is the most serious threat our educational system has ever seen."

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_810_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: They worked much harder when they learned that they were in line for a wage increase.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_811_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: For a time, they argued over which TV program to watch.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_812_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: A car was stolen last night right under the nose of a security guard.
